snippet.title: Fairune - Official Launch Trailer - iOS/Android
snippet.description:
GET IT NOW!

iOS: http://itunes.apple.com/app/id609432419
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.co.uraraworks.fairune


An action-puzzler RPG with a retro feel!
The scourge is back with a vengeance! Seal him off for good!
Collect the three Spirit Icons to lead the way to victory!


Fairune features:
- A gorgeous, nostalgic pixel art world!
- A fantastic chiptune soundtrack!
- An expansive adventure featuring 100 screens of action! 
- Unique monsters and lots of puzzles to solve!
- Scoreboards: try your best time in a speedrun!
- Best of all, it's free!


Credits:
- Art, sound, and game design: SKIPMORE (Y.Kimura)
- Programming: URARA-WORKS (M.Yonehara)
- Translation: NEP


Website:
https://www.facebook.com/skipmoregames
http://www.skipmore.com


Original Soundtrack:
http://www.skipmore.com/sp/fairune/
